name: SS Achilles
overview: An alien life-form has breached your star ship's security systems and is growing at an alarming rate. Can you keep the toxic fungus and its fast-traveling spores at bay while you salvage what you can from the ship? Keep vital corridors open, check on the scanners for new growths seeding and don't let it cut you from your escape shuttle.. Your objective is to collect all the objects from the abandoned ship by returning all the objects to the shuttle and avoiding the growth and scavengers on-board. There are 60 objects total - 20 relics, 20 integrity modules, and 20 power packs. Keys: SELECT = changes skill level START = starts game, during game operates sealant gun when the doors are purple. S= Scanner (must be over scanner icon) M= Back to game when in scanner mode Space = pause Hold Fire Button and Move = go faster, but uses power faster
